attributes.title: Bad!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app, keep in mind on my iPhone 11 Pro Max, I download it open it up. Starts glitching so what do I do? I restart my phone! I turn it on and I’m on android! This sh*t crazy! All my photo albums look like pixel art, my wallpaper tho, don’t get me started. I was walking my brother’s dog’s cousin’s sister’s brother’s Dad to the mall, then I saw something at first it was a dog so I went to pet it, BUT it turned out to be orange hair it grabbed me yanked me and took my phone what happened next? I look up I was like it’s a plane! It’s a bird! No it’s nothing, no seriously nothing. I was dying so I was hallucinating anyways tho, don’t get this app. Cause like why? Kanye2020 baby!

attributes.title: i love trump but 😹❤️✨
attributes.review: trump is such a great president i mean he’s definitely not homophobic, racist, a white supremacist, sexist etc. But this app is so innapropiate i mean he’s asking a minor for their phone number 😐🤢. that’s literally pedophilia. Also he’s married so this is distespectful to his wife ❤️😹

attributes.title: STEALS YOUR INFORMATION
attributes.review: This app took a total of 69 minutes to download and I had to turn off my phone 5 times to see any progress. I looked past this hoping to support my daddy,  my superhero, trump. Nothing happened for the rest of that day however in the late hours of the night everything started turning. I got a call that my cat ran away, my grandpa died and my whole immediate family got in a tricycle accident. Though upset I thought there couldn’t possibly be connected to downloading the app. Then I decided to fall asleep and deal with this all in the morning. While asleep I woke up and saw a tiny orange man scatter across my room. I thought I was seeing things but then my cat rose from the foot of my bed. He was now orange and wearing a fedora and tiny boots. I then realized that wasn’t my cat that was puss and boots. I then thought shrek wouldn’t be far off. So I got out of bed yelling “ take me now shrek, marry me baby girl” and while running to the door I tripped over this fat man orange man. I yelled “you’re not shrek, shrek is green not orange” he then said in the stupidest voice “hehe I’m taking you”. I then decided to show hospitality hoping to distract him and make a run for it. I handed him a glass of water but the first problem was that it was too big. He wasn’t able to hold the glass because his little hands were too small. I then had to get a shot glass which was the perfect size. I filled it with water and handed it over, but then the next problem appeared, he couldn’t drink the water. While focusing on taking a sip I managed to call the police. The police came and told me this was the president, I walked up and asked him how he got my address and garage code. He then said the app I downloaded takes all of that information and to deepest darkest secrets. He said he ordered a puss in boots impersonator because he knew my deepest darkest secret, my love for shrek. I then shouted you can’t order a impersonator! Identity theft is not a joke, Jim! Millions of families suffer every year!! . He then said the app was connected to all my families deaths however not the cat! Overall don’t download this app I lost everything to it

attributes.title: The bugs in this app are insane
attributes.review: The amount of bugs that have to be in this code are astronomical. It really just doesn’t work at all. It’s like somebody with only HTML experience decided they could code an entire app
